editorialSummary.text: Long-running bake shop specializing in cheesecakes, plus cookies cannoli & other sweet treats.

originalText.text: DEFINITELY a place to visit and try if you are in NYC! I had heard and read and watched so many shorts and reels about this and also from my work manager that I was already excited to visit and try these cheesecakes! I must say that ALL the hype about Eileenâ€™s Special Cheesecakes place is worth every single word! A tiny but unique place, small counter and a huge display of fresh cheesecakes and one can see the cake making in the bakery behind the counter! We tried 3 different cakes (one from the todayâ€™s special) and all were delicious and scrumptious ðŸ˜‹ - perfect blend of sweet, cheese and a hint of the actual flavour you select. I only wish words can capture a taste so that these cheesecakes can be described in a right sense! 200% worth a visit and experience - you will always face a short queue and you can stand and eat inside the shop! Enjoy ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text:
Eileen's Special Cheesecakes stands out as one of the premier cheesecake destinations in the New York City area. While the establishment may be compact with no seating available indoors, it boasts an array of exceptional cheesecakes that are truly worth savoring. The diverse selection of flavors and various portion sizes, particularly the enticing small cakes, provides an excellent opportunity to sample different flavors without committing to a full cake.

Each cheesecake is freshly homemade on-site, ensuring a delightful and delicious taste. The store's commitment to crafting these delectable treats in-house adds to the overall quality of the experience. If you appreciate high-quality cheesecakes and a wide variety of flavors, Eileen's Special Cheesecakes comes highly recommended.

originalText.text: Went this past August and had a wonderful experience. Long awaited! I got the original, strawberry, chocolate and Oreo cheesecakes. All amazing but the original is simply delicious. 5/5 recommend.

text.text: Went this past August and had a wonderful experience. Long awaited! I got the original, strawberry, chocolate and Oreo cheesecakes. All amazing but the original is simply delicious. 5/5 recommend.

originalText.text:
If you love cheesecake you must visit this place!!!
There are a lot of options ( cherry, strawberry, blueberry, chocolate, banana, plain etc).
I strongly recommend it!!
The staff is very helpful and polite!
Every cheesecake cost 6$.
I tried 2 because the portion is not big enough.
